s_synopsis: Rambo's back! Bow and arrow in hand, machine gun ready for action, Rambo looks bad and means business! Rambo's infiltrated Soviet-occupied Afghanistan to rescue Colonel Trautman, his mentor and friend. Trautman's been captured, and the Russians are viciously interrogating him for vital information. In the meantime, they've deployed troops, tanks and helicopters to scare off all rescue attempts.
